title: Carve Out A Great Life at Ridge Falls Apartments!
posting_body: ['Ridge Falls Apartments', 'Property Address', '2895 E Charleston Boulevard', 'Las Vegas, NV, 89104', 'http://ridgefalls.vegas/su/vyf8r7', 'Move-in ready 1 bed and 1 bath units are available right now.', 'Settle into your new 588 Sq.', 'Ft. square foot home in a friendly community with stunning amenities.', "With rents starting at $1,020.00, these units won't last.", 'Call us to schedule a tour or get started on an application today!', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 1x1', '1 Bedrooms / 1 Bathrooms', '588 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$1,020.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Gated Community', 'Basketball Court(s)', 'Swimming Pool', 'Business Center', 'On-Site Maintenance', 'Pet Park', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
